item.title: Maine's governor demands data on immigration arrests as fear spreads amid enforcement surge
item.description: Maine's Democratic governor has challenged federal immigration officials to provide arrest warrants, real-time numbers and information about detainees...

item.title: Florida's Black lawmakers denounce attorney general's opinion as damaging political stunt
item.description: Florida's Republican attorney general is questioning the constitutionality of state laws supporting minority contracting and diverse appointments

item.title: US sanctions Costa Rican drug network, including an aesthetic salon, for trafficking cocaine
item.description: The U.S. has imposed sanctions on five Costa Ricans and five Costa Rican entities for allegedly transporting cocaine from Colombia

item.title: Trial of Chicago man accused of putting bounty on top Border Patrol leader sent to jury
item.description: The fate of a Chicago man accused of using Snapchat to circulate a $10,000 bounty on the life of a top Border Patrol commander rests in a federal jury...

item.title: Vance heads to Minneapolis and says 'far left' should stop resisting immigration enforcement
item.description: Vice President JD Vance is blaming what he calls the "far left" for turmoil surrounding the White House's deportation campaign
